comments:
Description:
Exception throws when test text inline style-background in BIRT PDF emitter

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run attached file in bug #118984 to generate pdf through birt pdf emitter.

Expected result:
No errors.

Result:
SEVERE: An error happened while running the report. Cause:
